                    },
                    'de_inferno': { 
                        bounds: { minX: -2087, maxX: 2680, minY: -2000, maxY: 2000 },
                        radarScale: 5.0
                    },
                    'de_nuke': { 
                        bounds: { minX: -3153, maxX: 2792, minY: -2000, maxY: 2000 },
                        radarScale: 5.8
                    },
                    'de_ancient': { 
                        bounds: { minX: -2400, maxX: 2400, minY: -2000, maxY: 2000 },
                        radarScale: 5.3
                    },
                    'de_overpass': { 
                        bounds: { minX: -2840, maxX: 2032, minY: -2000, maxY: 2000 },
                        radarScale: 5.1
                    }
                };

                this.init2DRadar();
                this.init3DRadar();
                this.connectToServer();
                this.setupEventListeners();
            }

            init2DRadar() {
                this.canvas2d = document.getElementById('radar2d');
                this.ctx2d = this.canvas2d.getContext('2d');
                
                this.canvas2d.width = window.innerWidth;
                this.canvas2d.height = window.innerHeight;

                // Load map images with cache busting
                this.mapImages = {};
                Object.keys(this.maps).forEach(map => {
                    const img = new Image();
                    img.src = `/maps/${map}_radar.jpg?${Date.now()}`;
                    img.onerror = () => {
                        console.warn(`Failed to load map image for ${map}`);
                    };
                    this.mapImages[map] = img;
                });

                // Radar configuration
                this.radarConfig = {
                    zoom: 1.0,
                    rotation: 0,
                    showGrid: true,
                    showNames: true,
                    showHealth: true
                };
            }

            init3DRadar() {
                try {
                    // Scene setup
                    this.scene = new THREE.Scene();
                    this.scene.background = new THREE.Color(0x001100);
                    
                    // Camera setup
                    this.camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(75, window.innerWidth / window.innerHeight, 0.1, 1000);
                    this.camera.position.set(0, 100, 0);
                    this.camera.lookAt(0, 0, 0);
                    this.camera.rotation.x = -Math.PI / 2;

                    // Renderer setup
                    this.renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({
                        canvas: document.getElementById('radar3d'),
                        antialias: true,
                        alpha: true
                    });
                    this.renderer.setSize(window.innerWidth, window.innerHeight);
                    this.renderer.setClearColor(0x001100, 1);

                    // Lighting
                    const ambientLight = new THREE.AmbientLight(0x404040, 0.6);
                    this.scene.add(ambientLight);

                    const directionalLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.8);
                    directionalLight.position.set(50, 100, 50);
                    directionalLight.castShadow = true;
                    this.scene.add(directionalLight);

                    // Map geometry
                    this.createMapGeometry();
                    this.playerMeshes = new Map();
                    this.weaponMeshes = new Map();

                    console.log('[3D] 3D radar initialized successfully');

                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('[3D] Failed to initialize 3D radar:', error);
                }
            }

            createMapGeometry() {
                // Create ground plane
                const planeGeometry = new THREE.PlaneGeometry(200, 200, 50, 50);
                const planeMaterial = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({
                    color: 0x00ff00,
                    wireframe: true,
                    transparent: true,
                    opacity: 0.1
                });
                
                this.groundPlane = new THREE.Mesh(planeGeometry, planeMaterial);
                this.groundPlane.rotation.x = -Math.PI / 2;
                this.scene.add(this.groundPlane);

                // Grid helper
                const gridHelper = new THREE.GridHelper(200, 20, 0x00ff00, 0x00ff00);
                gridHelper.material.opacity = 0.2;
                gridHelper.material.transparent = true;
                this.scene.add(gridHelper);

                // Map boundaries
                const boundaryGeometry = new THREE.BoxGeometry(200, 10, 200);
                const boundaryMaterial = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({
                    color: 0xff0000,
                    wireframe: true,
                    transparent: true,
                    opacity: 0.05
                });
                
                this.mapBoundary = new THREE.Mesh(boundaryGeometry, boundaryMaterial);
                this.mapBoundary.position.y = -5;
                this.scene.add(this.mapBoundary);
            }

            connectToServer() {
                try {
                    // Generate authentication token
                    const token = this.generateAuthToken();
                    
                    // Connect to secure WebSocket
                    this.socket = io('https://your-vps-domain.com', {
                        query: { token },
                        transports: ['websocket'],
                        secure: true
                    });

                    this.socket.on('connect', () => {
                        this.updateStatus('✅ Connected to research server');
                        this.isRunning = true;
                        this.startAnimation();
                    });

                    this.socket.on('disconnect', () => {
                        this.updateStatus('❌ Disconnected - attempting reconnect');
                        this.isRunning = false;
                        setTimeout(() => this.connectToServer(), 5000);
                    });

                    this.socket.on('radar_update', (data) => {
                        this.processRadarData(data);
                    });

                    this.socket.on('config', (config) => {
                        this.sessionId = config.session;
                        console.log('[WS] Session configured:', config.session);
                    });

                    this.socket.on('error', (error) => {
                        console.error('[WS] Connection error:', error);
                        this.updateStatus('⚠️ Connection error - retrying...');
                    });

                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('[WS] Connection failed:', error);
                    setTimeout(() => this.connectToServer(), 5000);
                }
            }

            processRadarData(data) {
                if (!data || !data.players) return;

                this.players = data.players;
                this.currentMap = data.map || this.currentMap;

                // Update team statistics
                this.updateTeamStats();

                // Update visualization
                if (this.is3D) {
                    this.update3DRadar();
                } else {
                    this.update2DRadar();
                }

                // Process triggerbot logic
                if (this.triggerbotEnabled) {
                    this.processTriggerbotLogic();
                }
            }

            update2DRadar() {
                const ctx = this.ctx2d;
                const canvas = this.canvas2d;
                const mapConfig = this.maps[this.currentMap];

                if (!mapConfig) return;

                // Clear canvas with fade effect for smoother updates
                ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(10, 10, 10, 0.3)';
                ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);

                // Draw map background
                this.drawMapBackground(ctx, canvas, mapConfig);

                // Draw players
                this.players.forEach((player, index) => {
                    this.drawPlayer2D(ctx, player, mapConfig, index);
                });

                // Draw radar information
                this.drawRadarInfo(ctx);
            }

            drawMapBackground(ctx, canvas, mapConfig) {
                const mapImage = this.mapImages[this.currentMap];
                
                if (mapImage && mapImage.complete) {
                    // Draw map with correct aspect ratio
                    const scale = Math.min(canvas.width / mapImage.width, canvas.height / mapImage.height);
                    const width = mapImage.width * scale;
                    const height = mapImage.height * scale;
                    const x = (canvas.width - width) / 2;
                    const y = (canvas.height - height) / 2;

                    ctx.drawImage(mapImage, x, y, width, height);
                    
                    // Add overlay for better visibility
                    ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)';
                    ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
                } else {
                    // Fallback: draw grid and bounds
                    this.drawGridFallback(ctx, canvas, mapConfig);
                }
            }

            drawGridFallback(ctx, canvas, mapConfig) {
                ctx.strokeStyle = '#00ff00';
                ctx.lineWidth = 1;
                ctx.globalAlpha = 0.2;

                // Draw grid
                const gridSize = 50;
                for (let x = 0; x < canvas.width; x += gridSize) {
                    ctx.beginPath();
                    ctx.moveTo(x, 0);
                    ctx.lineTo(x, canvas.height);
                    ctx.stroke();
                }
                for (let y = 0; y < canvas.height; y += gridSize) {
                    ctx.beginPath();
                    ctx.moveTo(0, y);
                    ctx.lineTo(canvas.width, y);
                    ctx.stroke();
                }

                ctx.globalAlpha = 1.0;

                // Draw map bounds indicator
                ctx.strokeStyle = '#ff0000';
                ctx.lineWidth = 2;
                ctx.strokeRect(50, 50, canvas.width - 100, canvas.height - 100);
                
                ctx.fillStyle = '#00ff00';
                ctx.font = '14px Courier New';
                ctx.fillText(`Map: ${this.currentMap} (No Image)`, 60, 80);
            }

            drawPlayer2D(ctx, player, mapConfig, index) {
                const bounds = mapConfig.bounds;
                const scale = mapConfig.radarScale || 5.0;
                
                // Convert game coordinates to radar coordinates
                const x = ((player.x - bounds.minX) / (bounds.maxX - bounds.minX)) * ctx.canvas.width;
                const y = ctx.canvas.height - ((player.y - bounds.minY) / (bounds.maxY - bounds.minY)) * ctx.canvas.height;

                // Apply zoom and rotation
                const centerX = ctx.canvas.width / 2;
                const centerY = ctx.canvas.height / 2;
                
                const translatedX = (x - centerX) * this.radarConfig.zoom + centerX;
                const translatedY = (y - centerY) * this.radarConfig.zoom + centerY;

                ctx.save();

                // Player circle with team color
                const teamColor = player.team === 2 ? '#3498db' : '#e74c3c'; // CT blue, T red
                const isLocalPlayer = index === 0; // Assuming first player is local

                ctx.beginPath();
                ctx.arc(translatedX, translatedY, isLocalPlayer ? 8 : 6, 0, Math.PI * 2);
                ctx.fillStyle = teamColor;
                ctx.fill();
                
                // Border
                ctx.strokeStyle = isLocalPlayer ? '#ffffff' : '#2c3e50';
                ctx.lineWidth = isLocalPlayer ? 3 : 2;
                ctx.stroke();

                // Direction indicator
                if (player.view_angles) {
                    const angle = (player.view_angles.y || 0) * Math.PI / 180;
                    const lineLength = isLocalPlayer ? 20 : 15;
                    const endX = translatedX + Math.cos(angle) * lineLength;
                    const endY = translatedY - Math.sin(angle) * lineLength;

                    ctx.beginPath();
                    ctx.moveTo(translatedX, translatedY);
                    ctx.lineTo(endX, endY);
                    ctx.strokeStyle = '#ffffff';
                    ctx.lineWidth = 2;
                    ctx.stroke();
                }

                // Health bar
                if (this.radarConfig.showHealth) {
                    const healthWidth = 25 * (player.health / 100);
                    const healthColor = player.health > 50 ? '#2ecc71' : 
                                      player.health > 25 ? '#f39c12' : '#e74c3c';
                    
                    ctx.fillStyle = healthColor;
                    ctx.fillRect(translatedX - 12.5, translatedY - 20, healthWidth, 4);
                    ctx.strokeStyle = '#2c3e50';
                    ctx.strokeRect(translatedX - 12.5, translatedY - 20, 25, 4);
                }

                // Player name
                if (this.radarConfig.showNames && this.showPlayerInfo) {
                    ctx.fillStyle = '#ffffff';
                    ctx.font = '10px Courier New';
                    ctx.textAlign = 'center';
                    ctx.fillText(player.name || `Player${index}`, translatedX, translatedY - 25);
                    
                    // Additional info in stealth mode
                    if (!this.stealthMode) {
                        ctx.fillText(`HP:${player.health} A:${player.armor}`, translatedX, translatedY - 35);
                    }
                }

                // Weapon icon based on weapon_id
                this.drawWeaponIcon(ctx, translatedX, translatedY, player.weapon_id);

                ctx.restore();
            }

            drawWeaponIcon(ctx, x, y, weaponId) {
                // Simple weapon icons based on common weapon IDs
                const weaponIcons = {
                    // Rifles
                    7: '🔫', // AK-47
                    16: '🔫', // M4A4
                    40: '🔫', // Scout
                    9: '🔫', // AWP
                    // Pistols
                    1: '🔫', // Desert Eagle
                    2: '🔫', // Dual Berettas
                    30: '🔫', // Tec-9
                    // SMGs
                    17: '🔫', // MAC-10
                    19: '🔫', // P90
                    // Heavy
                    25: '🔫', // XM1014
                    27: '🔫', // MAG-7
                };

                const icon = weaponIcons[weaponId] || '🔫';
                if (this.showPlayerInfo) {
                    ctx.fillStyle = '#ffffff';
                    ctx.font = '12px Arial';
                    ctx.textAlign = 'center';
                    ctx.fillText(icon, x, y + 20);
                }
            }

            drawRadarInfo(ctx) {
                ctx.fillStyle = '#00ff00';
                ctx.font = '12px Courier New';
                ctx.textAlign = 'left';
                
                const infoLines = [
                    `Players: ${this.players.length}`,
                    `Map: ${this.currentMap}`,
                    `Mode: ${this.is3D ? '3D' : '2D'}`,
                    `Stealth: ${this.stealthMode ? 'ON' : 'OFF'}`,
                    `Triggerbot: ${this.triggerbotEnabled ? 'ON' : 'OFF'}`
                ];

                infoLines.forEach((line, index) => {
                    ctx.fillText(line, 10, 20 + (index * 15));
                });

                // Frame rate indicator
                this.updateFPS();
                ctx.fillText(`FPS: ${this.currentFPS}`, 10, 20 + (infoLines.length * 15));
            }

            update3DRadar() {
                if (!this.renderer) return;

                // Clear existing player meshes
                this.playerMeshes.forEach(mesh => this.scene.remove(mesh));
                this.playerMeshes.clear();

                // Add players to 3D scene
                this.players.forEach((player, index) => {
                    this.createPlayer3D(player, index);
                });

                // Render scene
                this.renderer.render(this.scene, this.camera);
            }

            createPlayer3D(player, id) {
                const mapConfig = this.maps[this.currentMap];
                if (!mapConfig) return;

                // Create player representation
                const geometry = new THREE.ConeGeometry(1.5, 4, 4);
                const material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({
                    color: player.team === 2 ? 0x3498db : 0xe74c3c
                });

                const playerMesh = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material);

                // Position in 3D space
                const bounds = mapConfig.bounds;
                const x = ((player.x - bounds.minX) / (bounds.maxX - bounds.minX) - 0.5) * 200;
                const z = ((player.y - bounds.minY) / (bounds.maxY - bounds.minY) - 0.5) * 200;
                const y = (player.z || 0) / 100; // Height adjustment

                playerMesh.position.set(x, y, z);

                // Rotate based on view angles
                if (player.view_angles) {
                    playerMesh.rotation.y = (player.view_angles.y || 0) * Math.PI / 180;
                }

                this.scene.add(playerMesh);
                this.playerMeshes.set(id, playerMesh);

                // Add health indicator
                this.createHealthIndicator(playerMesh, player.health);
            }

            createHealthIndicator(playerMesh, health) {
                const healthBar = new THREE.Mesh(
                    new THREE.PlaneGeometry(3, 0.3),
                    new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({
                        color: health > 50 ? 0x2ecc71 : health > 25 ? 0xf39c12 : 0xe74c3c
                    })
                );
                healthBar.position.y = 3;
                healthBar.rotation.x = -Math.PI / 2;
                playerMesh.add(healthBar);
            }

            processTriggerbotLogic() {
                if (!this.triggerbotEnabled || this.players.length < 2) return;

                const localPlayer = this.players[0]; // Assuming first is local
                if (!localPlayer) return;

                // Find best target
                const bestTarget = this.findBestTarget(localPlayer);
                if (bestTarget && this.shouldTrigger(localPlayer, bestTarget)) {
                    this.executeTrigger();
                }
            }

            findBestTarget(localPlayer) {
                let bestTarget = null;
                let bestScore = -1;

                this.players.forEach(player => {
                    if (player.team === localPlayer.team || player.health <= 0) return;

                    const score = this.calculateTargetScore(player, localPlayer);
                    if (score > bestScore) {
                        bestScore = score;
                        bestTarget = player;
                    }
                });

                return bestTarget;
            }

            calculateTargetScore(target, localPlayer) {
                let score = 0;

                // Distance scoring (closer = better)
                const distance = this.calculateDistance(target, localPlayer);
                score += Math.max(0, 1000 - distance);

                // Health scoring (lower health = better)
                score += (100 - target.health) * 10;

                // Visibility bonus
                if (target.spotted) score += 500;

                return score;
            }

            calculateDistance(player1, player2) {
                const dx = player1.x - player2.x;
                const dy = player1.y - player2.y;
                const dz = (player1.z || 0) - (player2.z || 0);
                return Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz);
            }

            shouldTrigger(localPlayer, target) {
                // Simple FOV check (in real implementation, use proper FOV calculation)
                const crosshairX = this.canvas2d.width / 2;
                const crosshairY = this.canvas2d.height / 2;
                
                const targetScreenPos = this.worldToScreen(target, localPlayer);
                if (!targetScreenPos) return false;

                const distanceToCrosshair = Math.sqrt(
                    Math.pow(targetScreenPos.x - crosshairX, 2) + 
                    Math.pow(targetScreenPos.y - crosshairY, 2)
                );

                return distanceToCrosshair < 50; // Pixel tolerance
            }

            worldToScreen(player, localPlayer) {
                const mapConfig = this.maps[this.currentMap];
                if (!mapConfig) return null;

                const bounds = mapConfig.bounds;
                const x = ((player.x - bounds.minX) / (bounds.maxX - bounds.minX)) * this.canvas2d.width;
                const y = this.canvas2d.height - ((player.y - bounds.minY) / (bounds.maxY - bounds.minY)) * this.canvas2d.height;

                return { x, y };
            }

            executeTrigger() {
                // Send trigger command through WebSocket
                if (this.socket && this.socket.connected) {
                    this.socket.emit('trigger_command', {
                        type: 'trigger_pull',
                        timestamp: Date.now(),
                        session: this.sessionId
                    });
                }
            }

            updateTeamStats() {
                const ctCount = this.players.filter(p => p.team === 2).length;
                const tCount = this.players.filter(p => p.team !== 2).length;

                document.getElementById('ctStats').textContent = `CT: ${ctCount} players`;
                document.getElementById('tStats').textContent = `T: ${tCount} players`;
                document.getElementById('totalPlayers').textContent = `Total: ${this.players.length} players`;
            }

            updateFPS() {
                const now = performance.now();
                if (!this.lastFrameTime) {
                    this.lastFrameTime = now;
                    this.frameCount = 0;
                    this.currentFPS = 0;
                    return;
                }

                this.frameCount++;
                if (now - this.lastFrameTime >= 1000) {
                    this.currentFPS = Math.round((this.frameCount * 1000) / (now - this.lastFrameTime));
                    this.frameCount = 0;
                    this.lastFrameTime = now;
                }
            }

            startAnimation() {
                const animate = () => {
                    if (this.isRunning) {
                        if (this.is3D && this.renderer) {
                            this.renderer.render(this.scene, this.camera);
                        }
                        requestAnimationFrame(animate);
                    }
                };
                animate();
            }

            toggleView() {
                this.is3D = !this.is3D;
                document.getElementById('radar2d').style.display = this.is3D ? 'none' : 'block';
                document.getElementById('radar3d').style.display = this.is3D ? 'block' : 'none';
                
                this.updateStatus(`Switched to ${this.is3D ? '3D' : '2D'} view`);
            }

            toggleRadar() {
                this.isRunning = !this.isRunning;
                this.updateStatus(this.isRunning ? 'Radar active' : 'Radar paused');
                
                if (this.isRunning) {
                    this.startAnimation();
                }
            }

            toggleStealth() {
                this.stealthMode = !this.stealthMode;
                this.updateStatus(`Stealth mode ${this.stealthMode ? 'enabled' : 'disabled'}`);
                
                // Apply stealth visual effects
                if (this.stealthMode) {
                    document.body.style.opacity = '0.9';
                } else {
                    document.body.style.opacity = '1';
                }
            }

            toggleTriggerbot() {
                this.triggerbotEnabled = !this.triggerbotEnabled;
                this.updateStatus(`Triggerbot ${this.triggerbotEnabled ? 'enabled' : 'disabled'}`);
            }

            changeMap(mapName) {
                this.currentMap = mapName;
                this.updateStatus(`Map changed to ${mapName}`);
                
                if (!this.is3D) {
                    this.update2DRadar();
                }
            }

            updateStatus(message) {
                const statusElement = document.getElementById('status');
                const timestamp = new Date().toLocaleTimeString();
                statusElement.textContent = `[${timestamp}] ${message}`;
                
                // Auto-clear status messages after 5 seconds
                setTimeout(() => {
                    if (statusElement.textContent.includes(message)) {
                        statusElement.textContent = `[${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}] System ready`;
                    }
                }, 5000);
            }

            setupEventListeners() {
                // Window resize handling
                window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
                    this.canvas2d.width = window.innerWidth;
                    this.canvas2d.height = window.innerHeight;
                    
                    if (this.renderer) {
                        this.renderer.setSize(window.innerWidth, window.innerHeight);
                        this.camera.aspect = window.innerWidth / window.innerHeight;
                        this.camera.updateProjectionMatrix();
                    }
                    
                    if (!this.is3D) {
                        this.update2DRadar();
                    }
                });

                // Keyboard shortcuts
                document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
                    if (e.ctrlKey || e.metaKey) return;
                    
                    switch(e.key) {
                        case '1':
                            this.toggleView();
                            break;
                        case '2':
                            this.toggleRadar();
                            break;
                        case '3':
                            this.toggleStealth();
                            break;
                        case '4':
                            this.toggleTriggerbot();
                            break;
                        case 'Escape':
                            this.emergencyStop();
                            break;
                    }
                });

                // Mouse wheel zoom
                this.canvas2d.addEventListener('wheel', (e) => {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    this.radarConfig.zoom += e.deltaY * -0.001;
                    this.radarConfig.zoom = Math.min(Math.max(0.1, this.radarConfig.zoom), 5.0);
                    this.update2DRadar();
                });
            }

            generateAuthToken() {
                const tokenData = {
                    timestamp: Date.now(),
                    session: 'research_' + Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9),
                    version: '2.0.0'
                };
                
                return btoa(JSON.stringify(tokenData));
            }

            emergencyStop() {
                this.isRunning = false;
                this.triggerbotEnabled = false;
                
                if (this.socket) {
                    this.socket.disconnect();
                }
                
                this.updateStatus('🛑 EMERGENCY STOP - All systems disabled');
                
                // Clear screen
                this.ctx2d.fillStyle = '#000000';
                this.ctx2d.fillRect(0, 0, this.canvas2d.width, this.canvas2d.height);
                
                this.ctx2d.fillStyle = '#ff0000';
                this.ctx2d.font = '24px Courier New';
                this.ctx2d.textAlign = 'center';
                this.ctx2d.fillText('EMERGENCY STOP ACTIVATED', this.canvas2d.width / 2, this.canvas2d.height / 2);
            }
        }

        // Initialize radar system when page loads
        let radarSystem;
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            radarSystem = new AdvancedRadarSystem();
        });

        // Prevent right-click context menu
        document.addEventListener('contextmenu', (e) => {
            e.preventDefault();
        });

        // Prevent text selection
        document.addEventListener('selectstart', (e) => {
            e.preventDefault();
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

📦 PART 7: Complete Build & Deployment System

H. Automated Build Scripts

build_windows.bat

batch
@echo off
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion

echo [BUILD] Starting complete build process...
echo.

:: Configuration
set PROJECT_NAME=VectorizedStealthRadar
set VERSION=2.0.0
set BUILD_DIR=build
set DIST_DIR=dist
set CONFIG_DIR=config

:: Clean previous builds
if exist "%BUILD_DIR%" rmdir /s /q "%BUILD_DIR%"
if exist "%DIST_DIR%" rmdir /s /q "%DIST_DIR%"

mkdir "%BUILD_DIR%"
mkdir "%DIST_DIR%"
mkdir "%CONFIG_DIR%"

echo [BUILD] Creating directory structure...
mkdir "%BUILD_DIR%\bin"
mkdir "%BUILD_DIR%\lib"
mkdir "%BUILD_DIR%\config"
mkdir "%BUILD_DIR%\logs"
mkdir "%BUILD_DIR%\drivers"

:: Build C++ components
echo [BUILD] Compiling C++ components...

:: Memory Reader
echo [CPP] Building vectorized_memory_reader...
cl /O2 /GL /EHsc /std:c++17 /I"include" /I"thirdparty\openssl\include" ^
   /D_WIN32_WINNT=0x0601 /DUNICODE /D_UNICODE ^
   source\vectorized_memory_reader.cpp ^
   source\signature_scanner.cpp ^
   source\encryption_engine.cpp ^
   /link /LIBPATH:"thirdparty\openssl\lib" libssl.lib libcrypto.lib ws2_32.lib ^
   /OUT:"%BUILD_DIR%\bin\vectorized_memory_reader.exe" ^
   /SUBSYSTEM:CONSOLE

if %errorlevel% neq 0 (
    echo [ERROR] Failed to build memory reader
    exit /b 1
)

:: Driver Loader
echo [CPP] Building ghub_kernel_payload...
cl /O2 /GL /EHsc /std:c++17 /I"include" ^
   /D_WIN32_WINNT=0x0601 /DUNICODE /D_UNICODE ^
   source\ghub_kernel_payload.cpp ^
   source\driver_communication.cpp ^
   /link advapi32.lib user32.lib ^
   /OUT:"%BUILD_DIR%\bin\ghub_kernel_payload.exe" ^
   /SUBSYSTEM:CONSOLE

if %errorlevel% neq 0 (
    echo [ERROR] Failed to build driver loader
    exit /b 1
)

bash
#!/bin/bash

# Advanced VPS Deployment Script
set -e

echo "🚀 Starting advanced VPS deployment..."
echo "========================================"

# Configuration
VPS_USER="admin"
VPS_IP="your-vps-ip"
DEPLOY_DIR="/opt/stealth_radar"
BACKUP_DIR="/opt/backups/stealth_radar"
DOMAIN_NAME="your-domain.com"
SSL_EMAIL="admin@${DOMAIN_NAME}"

# Colors for output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
NC='\033[0m'

# Logging functions
log_info() {
    echo -e "${GREEN}[INFO]${NC} $1"
}

log_warn() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARN]${NC} $1"
}

log_error() {
    echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $1"
}

# SSH execution function
ssh_exec() {
    ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ${VPS_USER}@${VPS_IP} "$1"
}

# File transfer function
transfer_file() {
    scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no "$1" ${VPS_USER}@${VPS_IP}:"$2"
}

# Create backup
create_backup() {
    log_info "Creating backup of existing installation..."
    ssh_exec "sudo mkdir -p ${BACKUP_DIR} && sudo cp -r ${DEPLOY_DIR} ${BACKUP_DIR}/stealth_radar_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)"
}

# System preparation
prepare_system() {
    log_info "Preparing system..."
    
    ssh_exec "
        # Update system
        sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade -y
        
        # Install required packages
        sudo apt-get install -y \
            nodejs npm git nginx certbot python3-certbot-nginx \
            build-essential libssl-dev software-properties-common \
            ufw fail2ban
        
        # Install latest Node.js
        curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | sudo -E bash -
        sudo apt-get install -y nodejs
        
        # Configure firewall
        sudo ufw allow ssh
        sudo ufw allow 80
        sudo ufw allow 443
        sudo ufw --force enable
        
        # Configure fail2ban
        sudo systemctl enable fail2ban
        sudo systemctl start fail2ban
    "
}

# Deploy application
deploy_application() {
    log_info "Deploying application..."
    
    # Create directory structure
    ssh_exec "sudo mkdir -p ${DEPLOY_DIR}/{bin,web,config,logs,ssl,backups}"
    
    # Transfer application files
    transfer_file "build/*" "${DEPLOY_DIR}/"
    
    # Set permissions
    ssh_exec "sudo chown -R ${VPS_USER}:${VPS_USER} ${DEPLOY_DIR}"
    ssh_exec "sudo chmod +x ${DEPLOY_DIR}/bin/*"
    
    # Install Node.js dependencies
    ssh_exec "cd ${DEPLOY_DIR} && npm install --production"
}

# Configure SSL
setup_ssl() {
    log_info "Setting up SSL certificates..."
    
    ssh_exec "
        # Stop nginx temporarily
        sudo systemctl stop nginx
        
        # Obtain SSL certificate
        sudo certbot certonly --standalone -d ${DOMAIN_NAME} --non-interactive --agree-tos -m ${SSL_EMAIL}
        
        # Create SSL directory and copy certificates
        sudo mkdir -p /etc/ssl/stealth_radar
        sudo cp /etc/letsencrypt/live/${DOMAIN_NAME}/fullchain.pem /etc/ssl/stealth_radar/
        sudo cp /etc/letsencrypt/live/${DOMAIN_NAME}/privkey.pem /etc/ssl/stealth_radar/
        sudo chmod 600 /etc/ssl/stealth_radar/*.pem
    "
}

# Configure nginx
setup_nginx() {
    log_info "Configuring nginx..."
    
    # Create nginx configuration
    ssh_exec "sudo tee /etc/nginx/sites-available/stealth_radar > /dev/null << EOF
server {
    listen 80;
    server_name ${DOMAIN_NAME};
    return 301 https://\$server_name\$request_uri;
}

server {
    listen 443 ssl http2;
    server_name ${DOMAIN_NAME};
    
    ssl_certificate /etc/ssl/stealth_radar/fullchain.pem;
    ssl_certificate_key /etc/ssl/stealth_radar/privkey.pem;
    
    # SSL security settings
    ssl_protocols TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3;
    ssl_ciphers ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384;
    ssl_prefer_server_ciphers off;
    
    # Security headers
    add_header X-Frame-Options DENY;
    add_header X-Content-Type-Options nosniff;
    add_header X-XSS-Protection \"1; mode=block\";
    add_header Strict-Transport-Security \"max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains\";
    
    # Main application
    location / {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:3000;
        proxy_http_version 1.1;
        proxy_set_header Upgrade \$http_upgrade;
        proxy_set_header Connection 'upgrade';
        proxy_set_header Host \$host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP \$remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For \$proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto \$scheme;
        proxy_cache_bypass \$http_upgrade;
    }
    
    # Static files
    location /static/ {
        alias ${DEPLOY_DIR}/web/static/;
        expires 1y;
        add_header Cache-Control \"public, immutable\";
    }
    
    # API endpoints
    location /api/ {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:3000/api/;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP \$remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For \$proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
    }
    
    # WebSocket support
    location /ws/ {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:3000/ws/;
        proxy_http_version 1.1;
        proxy_set_header Upgrade \$http_upgrade;
        proxy_set_header Connection \"Upgrade\";
        proxy_set_header Host \$host;
    }
}
EOF"
    
    # Enable site
    ssh_exec "
        sudo ln -sf /etc/nginx/sites-available/stealth_radar /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/
        sudo nginx -t
        sudo systemctl enable nginx
        sudo systemctl start nginx
    "
}

# Create systemd service
create_service() {
    log_info "Creating systemd service..."
    
    ssh_exec "sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/stealth-radar.service > /dev/null << EOF
[Unit]
Description=Advanced Stealth Radar Server
After=network.target
Wants=network.target

[Service]
Type=simple
User=${VPS_USER}
WorkingDirectory=${DEPLOY_DIR}
Environment=NODE_ENV=production
Environment=PORT=3000
ExecStart=/usr/bin/node ${DEPLOY_DIR}/cloud_server.js
ExecReload=/bin/kill -HUP \$MAINPID
Restart=always
RestartSec=10
StandardOutput=journal
StandardError=journal
SyslogIdentifier=stealth-radar

# Security settings
NoNewPrivileges=yes
PrivateTmp=yes
ProtectSystem=strict
ProtectHome=yes
ReadWritePaths=${DEPLOY_DIR}/logs
ProtectKernelTunables=yes
ProtectKernelModules=yes
ProtectControlGroups=yes

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF"
    
    ssh_exec "
        sudo systemctl daemon-reload
        sudo systemctl enable stealth-radar
        sudo systemctl start stealth-radar
    "
}

# Configure logging
setup_logging() {
    log_info "Setting up logging and monitoring..."
    
    ssh_exec "
        # Create log rotation
        sudo tee /etc/logrotate.d/stealth-radar > /dev/null << EOF
${DEPLOY_DIR}/logs/*.log {
    daily
    missingok
    rotate 14
    compress
    delaycompress
    notifempty
    copytruncate
}
EOF
        
        # Install and configure monitoring
        sudo apt-get install -y htop iotop nethogs
        
        # Create health check script
        sudo tee ${DEPLOY_DIR}/scripts/health_check.sh > /dev/null << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
SERVICE=\"stealth-radar\"
LOG_FILE=\"${DEPLOY_DIR}/logs/health_check.log\"

check_service() {
    if ! systemctl is-active --quiet \$SERVICE; then
        echo \"\$(date): Service \$SERVICE is not running. Restarting...\" >> \$LOG_FILE
        systemctl restart \$SERVICE
    fi
}

check_disk() {
    USAGE=\$(df / | awk 'NR==2 {print \$5}' | sed 's/%//')
    if [ \$USAGE -gt 90 ]; then
        echo \"\$(date): Disk usage is over 90%\" >> \$LOG_FILE
    fi
}

check_memory() {
    FREE=\$(free -m | awk 'NR==2{print \$4}')
    if [ \$FREE -lt 100 ]; then
        echo \"\$(date): Low memory: \$FREE MB free\" >> \$LOG_FILE
    fi
}

check_service
check_disk
check_memory
EOF
        
        sudo chmod +x ${DEPLOY_DIR}/scripts/health_check.sh
        
        # Add to crontab
        (crontab -l 2>/dev/null; echo \"*/5 * * * * ${DEPLOY_DIR}/scripts/health_check.sh\") | crontab -
    "
}

# Security hardening
harden_security() {
    log_info "Performing security hardening..."
    
    ssh_exec "
        # SSH hardening
        sudo sed -i 's/#PasswordAuthentication yes/PasswordAuthentication no/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
        sudo sed -i 's/#PermitRootLogin yes/PermitRootLogin no/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
        
        # System hardening
        echo 'net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies=1' | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf
        echo 'net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter=1' | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf
        echo 'net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter=1' | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf
        
        sudo sysctl -p
        
        # Application security
        sudo chown root:root ${DEPLOY_DIR}/bin/*
        sudo chmod 755 ${DEPLOY_DIR}/bin/*
    "
}

# Final setup
final_setup() {
    log_info "Performing final setup..."
    
    ssh_exec "
        # Create startup script
        sudo tee ${DEPLOY_DIR}/start.sh > /dev/null << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
echo \"Starting Advanced Stealth Radar System...\"
cd ${DEPLOY_DIR}

node cloud_server.js >> logs/cloud_server.log 2>&1 &

EOF
        
        sudo chmod +x ${DEPLOY_DIR}/start.sh
        
        # Create management script
        sudo tee ${DEPLOY_DIR}/manage.sh > /dev/null << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
case \"\$1\" in
    start)
        systemctl start stealth-radar
        ;;
    stop)
        systemctl stop stealth-radar
        ;;
    restart)
        systemctl restart stealth-radar
        ;;
    status)
        systemctl status stealth-radar
        ;;
    logs)
        journalctl -u stealth-radar -f
        ;;
    update)
        cd ${DEPLOY_DIR} && git pull && npm install && systemctl restart stealth-radar
        ;;
    *)
        echo \"Usage: \$0 {start|stop|restart|status|logs|update}\"
        exit 1
        ;;
esac
EOF
        
        sudo chmod +x ${DEPLOY_DIR}/manage.sh
    "
}

# Main deployment function
main() {
    log_info "Starting deployment to ${VPS_IP}"
    
    create_backup
    prepare_system
    deploy_application

}

master_control.py

python
#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Advanced Stealth Radar - Master Control System
Complete integration and management of all components
"""

import os
import sys
import time
import json
import socket
import threading
import subprocess
from pathlib import Path
from cryptography.fernet import Fernet
from cryptography.hazmat.primitives import hashes
from cryptography.hazmat.primitives.kdf.pbkdf2 import PBKDF2HMAC
import base64

class MasterControlSystem:
    def __init__(self):
        self.config = self.load_config()
        self.components = {}
        self.system_status = {}
        self.encryption_key = self.generate_encryption_key()
        self.running = False
        
    def load_config(self):
        """Load system configuration"""
        config_path = Path("config/system_config.json")
        if config_path.exists():
            with open(config_path, 'r') as f:
                return json.load(f)
        else:
            return self.create_default_config()
    
    def create_default_config(self):
        """Create default system configuration"""
        config = {
            "system": {
                "version": "2.0.0",
                "auto_start": True,
                "stealth_mode": True,
                "log_level": "INFO"
            },
            "components": {
                "memory_reader": {
                    "enabled": True,
                    "executable": "bin/vectorized_memory_reader.exe",
                    "arguments": ["--stealth", "--auto-update"],
                    "priority": "high"
                },
                "driver_loader": {
                    "enabled": True,
                    "executable": "bin/ghub_kernel_payload.exe", 
                    "arguments": ["--kernel-mode", "--hide-process"],
                    "priority": "high"
                },
                "hardware_bridge": {
                    "enabled": True,
                    "type": "arduino_rpi",
                    "com_port": "COM3",
                    "baud_rate": 115200
                },
                "cloud_client": {
                    "enabled": True,
                    "vps_endpoint": "https://your-vps-domain.com",
                    "update_interval": 50,
                    "encryption": True
                }
            },
            "security": {
                "encryption_key": base64.urlsafe_b64encode(os.urandom(32)).decode(),
                "traffic_mimicking": True,
                "process_hiding": True,
                "memory_obfuscation": True
            },
            "network": {
                "websocket_port": 443,
                "api_endpoint": "/api/radar",
                "heartbeat_interval": 30
            }
        }
        
        # Save default config
        os.makedirs("config", exist_ok=True)
        with open("config/system_config.json", 'w') as f:
            json.dump(config, f, indent=2)
            
        return config
    
    def generate_encryption_key(self):
        """Generate encryption key from system fingerprint"""
        system_info = f"{socket.gethostname()}{os.environ.get('USERNAME', '')}"
        kdf = PBKDF2HMAC(
            algorithm=hashes.SHA256(),
            length=32,
            salt=b'stealth_radar_salt',
            iterations=100000,
        )
        key = base64.urlsafe_b64encode(kdf.derive(system_info.encode()))
        return Fernet(key)
    
    def encrypt_data(self, data):
        """Encrypt sensitive data"""
        if isinstance(data, dict):
            data = json.dumps(data)
        return self.encryption_key.encrypt(data.encode()).decode()
    
    def decrypt_data(self, encrypted_data):
        """Decrypt sensitive data"""
        try:
            decrypted = self.encryption_key.decrypt(encrypted_data.encode())
            return json.loads(decrypted.decode())
        except:
            return None
    
    def start_component(self, component_name, config):
        """Start a system component"""
        if not config.get("enabled", False):
            print(f"[SKIP] {component_name} is disabled")
            return None
            
        try:
            executable = config["executable"]
            arguments = config.get("arguments", [])
            
            # Build command
            cmd = [executable] + arguments
            
            # Start process
            process = subprocess.Popen(
                cmd,
                stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
                stderr=subprocess.PIPE,
                stdin=subprocess.PIPE,
                creationflags=subprocess.CREATE_NO_WINDOW
            )
            
            self.components[component_name] = {
                "process": process,
                "config": config,
                "start_time": time.time(),
                "restart_count": 0
            }
            
            print(f"[OK] Started {component_name} (PID: {process.pid})")
            return process
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"[ERROR] Failed to start {component_name}: {e}")
            return None
    
    def stop_component(self, component_name):
        """Stop a system component"""
        if component_name in self.components:
            component = self.components[component_name]
            try:
                component["process"].terminate()
                component["process"].wait(timeout=5)
                print(f"[OK] Stopped {component_name}")
            except:
                component["process"].kill()
                print(f"[FORCE] Killed {component_name}")
            finally:
                del self.components[component_name]
    
    def monitor_components(self):
        """Monitor all running components"""
        while self.running:
            for name, component in list(self.components.items()):
                process = component["process"]
                
                # Check if process is still running
                if process.poll() is not None:
                    print(f"[WARN] {name} stopped unexpectedly")
                    
                    # Check restart policy
                    if component["restart_count"] < 3:
                        component["restart_count"] += 1
                        print(f"[INFO] Restarting {name} (attempt {component['restart_count']})")
                        self.stop_component(name)
                        time.sleep(2)
                        self.start_component(name, component["config"])
                    else:
                        print(f"[ERROR] {name} failed too many times, giving up")
                        del self.components[name]
            
            time.sleep(5)
    
    def system_health_check(self):
        """Perform system health check"""
        health_status = {
            "timestamp": time.time(),
            "components": {},
            "system": {
                "cpu_usage": self.get_cpu_usage(),
                "memory_usage": self.get_memory_usage(),
                "disk_usage": self.get_disk_usage(),
                "network_status": self.check_network()
            }
        }
        
        for name, component in self.components.items():
            process = component["process"]
            health_status["components"][name] = {
                "running": process.poll() is None,
                "pid": process.pid,
                "uptime": time.time() - component["start_time"],
                "restart_count": component["restart_count"]
            }
        
        return health_status
    
    def get_cpu_usage(self):
        """Get CPU usage percentage"""
        try:
            result = subprocess.check_output(
                "wmic cpu get loadpercentage", 
                shell=True
            ).decode()
            lines = result.strip().split('\r\r\n')
            for line in lines:
                if line.isdigit():
                    return int(line)
        except:
            pass
        return 0
    
    def get_memory_usage(self):
        """Get memory usage percentage"""
        try:
            result = subprocess.check_output(
                "wmic OS get FreePhysicalMemory,TotalVisibleMemorySize /value", 
                shell=True
            ).decode()
            
            lines = result.strip().split('\r\r\n')
            memory_info = {}
            for line in lines:
                if '=' in line:
                    key, value = line.split('=')
                    memory_info[key] = int(value)
            
            if 'TotalVisibleMemorySize' in memory_info and 'FreePhysicalMemory' in memory_info:
                total = memory_info['TotalVisibleMemorySize']
                free = memory_info['FreePhysicalMemory']
                used = total - free
                return (used / total) * 100
        except:
            pass
        return 0
    
    def get_disk_usage(self):
        """Get disk usage percentage"""
        try:
            result = subprocess.check_output(
                "wmic logicaldisk where size>0 get size,freespace", 
                shell=True
            ).decode()
            
            lines = result.strip().split('\r\r\n')
            for line in lines[1:]:  # Skip header
                if line.strip():
                    parts = line.split()
                    if len(parts) >= 2:
                        free = int(parts[0])
                        total = int(parts[1])
                        used = total - free
                        return (used / total) * 100
        except:
            pass
        return 0
    
    def check_network(self):
        """Check network connectivity"""
        try:
            socket.create_connection(("8.8.8.8", 53), timeout=5)
            return True
        except:
            return False
    
    def stealth_operations(self):
        """Perform stealth maintenance operations"""
        while self.running:
            try:
                # Clean system logs
                self.clean_logs()
                
                # Obfuscate network traffic
                self.obfuscate_traffic()
                
                # Rotate encryption keys
                self.rotate_keys()
                
                # Update component configurations
                self.update_configurations()
                
                time.sleep(60)  # Run every minute
                
            except Exception as e:
                print(f"[STEALTH] Operation failed: {e}")
    
    def clean_logs(self):
        """Clean system and application logs"""
        try:
            # Clear event logs
            subprocess.run("wevtutil cl System", shell=True, capture_output=True)
            subprocess.run("wevtutil cl Application", shell=True, capture_output=True)
            subprocess.run("wevtutil cl Security", shell=True, capture_output=True)
            
            # Clean temporary files
            subprocess.run("del /q /f %temp%\\* 2>nul", shell=True, capture_output=True)
            subprocess.run("del /q /f C:\\Windows\\Temp\\* 2>nul", shell=True, capture_output=True)
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"[CLEAN] Failed to clean logs: {e}")
    
    def obfuscate_traffic(self):
        """Obfuscate network traffic patterns"""
        # Generate fake network traffic
        try:
            # This would implement traffic mimicking in production
            pass
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"[TRAFFIC] Obfuscation failed: {e}")
    
    def rotate_keys(self):
        """Rotate encryption keys"""
        try:
            # Generate new encryption key
            new_key = base64.urlsafe_b64encode(os.urandom(32)).decode()
            self.config["security"]["encryption_key"] = new_key
            
            # Update configuration file
            with open("config/system_config.json", 'w') as f:
                json.dump(self.config, f, indent=2)
                
            print("[KEYS] Encryption keys rotated")
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"[KEYS] Rotation failed: {e}")
    
    def update_configurations(self):
        """Update component configurations dynamically"""
        try:
            # Check for configuration updates from VPS
            # This would fetch updated offsets and settings
            pass
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"[CONFIG] Update failed: {e}")
    
    def emergency_stop(self):
        """Emergency stop all components"""
        print("[EMERGENCY] Initiating emergency shutdown...")
        
        self.running = False
        
        # Stop all components
        for component_name in list(self.components.keys()):
            self.stop_component(component_name)
        
        # Clean up traces
        self.clean_logs()
        
        print("[EMERGENCY] Shutdown complete")
    
    def start_system(self):
        """Start the complete system"""
        print("🚀 Starting Advanced Stealth Radar System...")
        print("=" * 50)
        
        self.running = True
        
        try:
            # Start monitoring thread
            monitor_thread = threading.Thread(target=self.monitor_components)
            monitor_thread.daemon = True
            monitor_thread.start()
            
            # Start stealth operations thread
            stealth_thread = threading.Thread(target=self.stealth_operations)
            stealth_thread.daemon = True
            stealth_thread.start()
            
            # Start components in order
            components_config = self.config["components"]
            startup_order = ["driver_loader", "memory_reader", "hardware_bridge", "cloud_client"]
            
            for component_name in startup_order:
                if component_name in components_config:
                    self.start_component(component_name, components_config[component_name])
                    time.sleep(2)  # Stagger startup
            
            print("\n" + "=" * 50)
            print("✅ System started successfully!")
            print("📊 Running health monitor...")
            
            # Main system loop
            while self.running:
                health = self.system_health_check()
                self.system_status = health
                
                # Display status
                self.display_status(health)
                
                time.sleep(10)  # Update every 10 seconds
                
        except KeyboardInterrupt:
            print("\n[INFO] Shutdown requested by user")
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"[ERROR] System failure: {e}")
        finally:
            self.emergency_stop()
    
    def display_status(self, health):
        """Display system status"""
        os.system('cls' if os.name == 'nt' else 'clear')
        
        print("🛡️  Advanced Stealth Radar System - Status Monitor")
        print("=" * 60)
        
        # System info
        print(f"🖥️  System Health:")
        print(f"   CPU Usage: {health['system']['cpu_usage']}%")
        print(f"   Memory Usage: {health['system']['memory_usage']:.1f}%")
        print(f"   Disk Usage: {health['system']['disk_usage']:.1f}%")
        print(f"   Network: {'✅ Connected' if health['system']['network_status'] else '❌ Disconnected'}")
        
        print("\n🔧 Component Status:")
        for name, status in health["components"].items():
            status_icon = "✅" if status["running"] else "❌"
            uptime = time.strftime("%H:%M:%S", time.gmtime(status["uptime"]))
            print(f"   {status_icon} {name}: PID {status['pid']}, Uptime: {uptime}")
        
        print(f"\n🕒 Last Update: {time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}")
        print("Press Ctrl+C to shutdown system")
        print("-" * 60)

def main():
    """Main entry point"""
    try:
        control_system = MasterControlSystem()
        control_system.start_system()
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"Fatal error: {e}")
        sys.exit(1)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
